front.title: Extensions to the Access Control Lists (ACLs) YANG Model

abstract.t: RFC 8519 defines a YANG data model for Access Control Lists (ACLs). This document discusses a set of extensions that fix many of the limitations of the ACL model as initially defined in RFC 8519. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Discussion of this document takes place on the Network Modeling Working Group mailing list (netmod@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/netmod/. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/boucadair/enhanced-acl-netmod.
